item.title: Selected Presentations and Talks
item.description:
This is a selected list of talks and posters I presented throughout my academic career. Where applicable or available, the presentation slides can be viewed as well.

Talks

1. Measurement-based and blind quantum computation (Slides)

  • I gave a PhD seminar at the Berlin School of Optical Sciences and Quantum Technologies (BOS.QT) in 2021.

2. Graph states as quantum networks (Slides)

  • In the Koch group at Freie Universit√§t Berlin (FUB) during a research visit in 2022.

3. Extracting maximal entanglement from linear cluster states (Slides)
